question: My father has Diabetes, High Blood Pressure, and High Cholesterol.  In the last year if he is exposed to sun light for 30 minutes or longer he gets diarrhea.  Its not something he eats or medication.  Its been long enough were he has not question, that the sun is what is causing the diarrhea.  He is unable to say garden, or go outside and work during sun light hours.
title: Sun Exposure Causing Diarrhea
